      • getList

        public java.util.List<Dice> getList(int round)
        Parameters:
        round - Represents the number of the chosen round
        Returns:
        A list of the dices placed on the round track on the selected round
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the requested round is bigger than the current one

      • getDice

        public Dice getDice(int roundIndex,
                    int listIndex)
        Parameters:
        roundIndex - Represents the number of the chosen round
        listIndex - Represents the number of the dice in the chosen round
        Returns:
        The chosen dice
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If listIndex is bigger than the size of the list

      • addDice

        public void addDice(int round,
                    Dice dice)
        To be used only while using a tool card.
        Parameters:
        round - Represents the number of the chosen round
        dice - Represents the dice that has to be placed on the round track

      • addDices

        public void addDices(java.util.List<Dice> dices)
        Adds the remaining dices of the draft pool to the round track
        Parameters:
        dices - The list of dices remained in the draft pool at the end of the round

      • roundToString

        public java.lang.String roundToString(int round)
        Parameters:
        round - Represents the number of the chosen round
        Returns:
        A string that represents the dices on the round track on the chosen round

      • sumDiceValue

        public int sumDiceValue()
        This method will be used only in single player mode.
        Returns:
        The sum of all the dices' value on the round track
